lego: it's not a problem/this is not a problem
practice_phrases: This is not a problem
这不是问题
That isn't a problem
那不是问题
I think this is not a problem
我认为这不是问题
I believe this is not a problem
我相信这不是问题
I'm so happy this is not a problem
我很高兴这不是问题
My friend said this is not a problem
我的朋友说这不是问题
I think that your idea is good because this is not a problem
我认为你的主意好因为这不是问题
I believe that when you work together this is not a problem
我相信当你们一起工作的时候这不是问题
I'm so happy that this is not a problem for my friend
我很高兴对我的朋友这不是问题
That was a surprise because I thought this is not a problem
那是个惊喜因为我认为这不是问题
Something difficult
困难的事情
That's something difficult
那是困难的事情
I think that's something difficult
我认为那是困难的事情
This is not a problem, that's something difficult
这不是问题那是困难的事情
I believe that your idea is something difficult
我相信你的主意是困难的事情
My friend said that this work is something difficult
我的朋友说这个工作是困难的事情
I'm so happy that something difficult is not a problem for you
我很高兴困难的事情对你不是问题
I think when you work together something difficult is not a problem
我认为当你们一起工作的时候困难的事情不是问题
Your friend believes that this work is something difficult
你的朋友相信这个工作是困难的事情
I wanted to see you because something difficult is not a problem
我想见你因为困难的事情不是问题

lego: work at something difficult/do difficult things
practice_phrases: Do difficult things
做困难的事情
You do difficult things
你做困难的事情
I think you do difficult things
我认为你做困难的事情
This is not a problem when you do difficult things
当你做困难的事情时这不是问题
I'm so happy that you do difficult things
我很高兴你做困难的事情
I believe when you do difficult things this is not a problem
我相信当你做困难的事情时这不是问题
My friend is so happy that you do difficult things so well
我的朋友很高兴你做困难的事情这么好
I think when you work together and do difficult things this is not a problem
我认为当你们一起工作做困难的事情时这不是问题
I wanted to see you do difficult things because you're doing so well
我想见你做困难的事情因为你做得这么好
I believe that when you do difficult things you will know someone very well
我相信当你做困难的事情时你会非常了解一个人
With them
和他们一起
Work together with them
和他们一起工作
I work together with them
我和他们一起工作
I think you work together with them
我认为你和他们一起工作
I'm so happy when you work together with them
当你和他们一起工作时我很高兴
I believe you do difficult things with them very well
我相信你和他们一起做困难的事情非常好
This is not a problem when you work together with them
当你和他们一起工作时这不是问题
My friend said you do difficult things with them so well
我的朋友说你和他们一起做困难的事情这么好
I wanted to see you work together with them on something difficult
我想见你和他们一起做困难的事情
I think when you do difficult things with them this is not a problem
我认为当你和他们一起做困难的事情时这不是问题
